1: וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And the sons</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>Elisha</n> הִנֵּֽה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> הַמָּק֗וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>Behold now the place</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>where we dwell</n> שָׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>unto</n> צַ֥ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>with thee is too strait</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>is too</n>

3: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>And one</n> ה֥וֹאֶל <sup>2974 </sup> <n>Be content</n> נָ֖א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> וְלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>with thy servants</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he answered</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>shall go</n>
4: וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> אִתָּ֑ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>with them And when they came</n> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <sup>3383 </sup> <n>to Jordan</n> וַֽיִּגְזְר֖וּ <sup>1504 </sup> <n>they cut down</n> הָעֵצִֽים׃ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>wood</n>
5: וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הָֽאֶחָד֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>But as one</n> מַפִּ֣יל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>was felling</n> הַקּוֹרָ֔ה <sup>6982 </sup> <n>a beam</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>the axe head</n> נָפַ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fell</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הַמָּ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>into the water</n> וַיִּצְעַ֥ק <sup>6817 </sup> <n>and he cried</n> וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֲהָ֥הּ <sup>162 </sup> <n>Alas</n> אֲדֹנִ֖י <sup>113 </sup> <n>master</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it was</n> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>for it was borrowed</n>

18: וַיֵּרְדוּ֮ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>And when they came down</n> אֵלָיו֒ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>prayed</n> אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>to him Elisha</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הַךְ־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Smite</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>pray</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגּוֹי־ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>this people</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֑ים <sup>5575 </sup> <n>I pray thee with blindness</n> וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And he smote</n> בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֖ים <sup>5575 </sup> <n>them with blindness</n> כִּדְבַ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>according to the word</n> אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <sup>477 </sup> <n>of Elisha</n>

20: וַיְהִי֮ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּבֹאָ֣ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when they were come</n> שֹׁמְרוֹן֒ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>into Samaria</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>that Elisha</n> יְהוָ֕ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> פְּקַ֥ח <sup>6491 </sup> <n>open</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינֵֽי־ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the eyes</n> אֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> וְיִרְא֑וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>of these [men] that they may see</n> וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <sup>6491 </sup> <n>opened</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>their eyes</n> וַיִּרְא֕וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and they saw</n> וְהִנֵּ֖ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>and behold [they were] in the midst</n> שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n>
21: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>unto Elisha</n> כִּרְאֹת֖וֹ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>when he saw</n> אוֹתָ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> הַאַכֶּ֥ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>shall I smite</n> אַכֶּ֖ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>[them]? shall I smite</n> אָבִֽי׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>them My father</n>
22: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he answered</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַכֶּ֔ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not smite</n> הַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>those</n> שָׁבִ֛יתָ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>those whom thou hast taken captive</n> בְּחַרְבְּךָ֥ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with thy sword</n> וּֽבְקַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>arch</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> מַכֶּ֑ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>[them] wouldest thou smite</n> שִׂים֩ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>appoint</n> לֶ֨חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וָמַ֜יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and water</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וְיֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>them that they may eat</n> וְיִשְׁתּ֔וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> וְיֵלְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>113 </sup> <n>to their master</n>
23: וַיִּכְרֶ֨ה <sup>3739 </sup> <n>And he prepared</n> לָהֶ֜ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> כֵּרָ֣ה <sup>3740 </sup> <n>provision</n> גְדוֹלָ֗ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>great</n> וַיֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>for them and when they had eaten</n> וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drunk</n> וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <sup>7971 </sup> <n>he sent them away</n> וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>113 </sup> <n>to their master</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָ֤סְפוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>no more</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <sup>1416 </sup> <n>So the bands</n> אֲרָ֔ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> לָב֖וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into the land</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> פ
24: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after this</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>this</n> וַיִּקְבֹּ֛ץ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>gathered</n> בֶּן־ הֲדַ֥ד <sup>1130 </sup> <n>that Benhadad</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> אֲרָ֖ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>all his host</n> וַיַּ֕עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and went up</n> וַיָּ֖צַר <sup>6696 </sup> <n>and besieged</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>Samaria</n>
25: וַיְהִ֨י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>was sold</n> רָעָ֤ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>famine</n> גָּדוֹל֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>And there was a great</n> בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>in Samaria</n> וְהִנֵּ֖ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> צָרִ֣ים <sup>6696 </sup> <n>and behold they besieged</n> עָלֶ֑יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עַ֣ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הֱי֤וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>was sold</n> רֹאשׁ־ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>head</n> חֲמוֹר֙ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>it until an ass's</n> בִּשְׁמֹנִ֣ים <sup>8084 </sup> <n>was [sold] for fourscore</n> כֶּ֔סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>[pieces] of silver</n> וְרֹ֛בַע <sup>7255 </sup> <n>and the fourth part</n> הַקַּ֥ב <sup>6894 </sup> <n>of a cab</n> [חֲרֵייֹונִים כ] (דִּבְיֹונִ֖ים <sup>2755 </sup> <n>doves' dung</n> ק) בַּחֲמִשָּׁה־ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>for five</n> כָֽסֶף׃ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>[pieces] of silver</n>

And she answered</n> הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>This woman</n> הַזֹּ֜את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אָמְרָ֣ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלַ֗י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> תְּנִ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>unto me Give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵךְ֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy son</n> וְנֹאכְלֶ֣נּוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that we may eat</n> הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>him to day</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנִ֖י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>my son</n> נֹאכַ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and we will eat</n> מָחָֽר׃ <sup>4279 </sup> <n>to morrow</n>
